title: Not Everything is for Social Media
itunes:title: Not Everything is for Social Media
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners would do if they were Lebron James and their son was caught smoking a substance on Ig, would you leave the bubble to discipline? Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the Atlanta Falcons for losing to the Dallas Cowboys and Tricia Clark who spoke on entrepreneurial Risk & Reward, Mentorships, New Show “I Quit” and more

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
